text: As the benefits of cloud computing drive increased adoption, Vulnerability Management is more important than ever.
AWS makes it easier by helping you identify,
track and remediate security weaknesses within the cloud environment.
Because this is dynamic in nature the customer
is responsible for penetration testing cloud patch management,
AWS empowers users by providing several services and tools:
Amazon Inspector assesses applications for exposures and vulnerabilities.
AWS Trusted Advisor helps analyze the environment and provides best practice recommendations.
And AWS Systems Manager can automate patch management,
desired state configuration for antivirus software and firewall ports,
These are just a few ways AWS is here to help you, with Vulnerability Management.
To learn more, go to aws.amazon.com/security
